changeSet.createView: SELECT w.name AS workspace, wa.key AS wsp_key, wa.description AS wsp_desc, ra.id, r.name AS agency, a.name AS attribute, ra.key AS key, ra.numeric_value, ra.integer_value, ra.boolean_value, ra.text_value, ra.json_value, u.name AS unit, ra.notes, up.name AS updated_by, ra.updated, ra.version FROM agency_attribute ra JOIN agency r ON ra.agency = r.id JOIN attribute a ON ra.attribute = a.id LEFT JOIN unit u ON ra.unit = u.id JOIN agency up ON ra.updated_by = up.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.workspace_authorization wa ON ra.workspace = wa.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.product w ON wa.defining_product = w.id
